previewArticle.title: LA Galaxy vs. Portland Timbers | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: LA Galaxy 2, Portland Timbers 2 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The LA Galaxy and Portland Timbers meet for a second time this season in a key Western Conference matchup when the clubs provide the Independence Day festivities at StubHub Center before an NBC Sports Network audience.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: LA Galaxy vs Portlad Timbers | July 4, 2014

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Peter Rossi
timelineItems.text: Timbers wearing throwbacks let's do it #PTFC

timelineItems.name: Teshawn Edmonds
timelineItems.text: Team colors (both @adidasUS): @TimbersFC: Dark Forest Green/Gold; @LAGalaxy: White/Collegiate Navy Blue/Gold #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: Indubitably RT @Chris_Hoenig Paul Stanley singing the national anthem is the least Paul Stanley thing ever. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: David Ballard
timelineItems.text: Ha, @PaulStanleyLive just sang the #USA national anthem for us! #LAGalaxy http://t.co/l8Cf79zNxf

timelineItems.name: David Ballard
timelineItems.text: Ha, @PaulStanleyLive just sang the #USA national anthem for us! #LAGalaxy http://t.co/l8Cf79zNxf

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Marcelo Sarvas.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Donovan Ricketts stones Robbie Keane 1v1

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: Commentating I can stand by. "Keane goes nutmeg on Michael Harrington and escapes." #LAvPOR

timelineItems.desc: Dan Haiek and Armchair Analyst Matt Doyle preview the Friday night match between the LA Galaxy and Portland Timbers. What is the best spot for Gyasi Zardes vs. Portland? Will Diego Valeri keep racking up the assists? Find out Friday at 11pm ET on NBCSN.
timelineItems.title: LA Galaxy vs Portland Timbers July 4, 2014 Preview | Scouting Report

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Shot Juni! The li’l Brazilian has the #LAGalaxy’s first look at goal but it goes just wide: http://t.co/KaCRKufUyA #LAvPOR

timelineItems.desc: Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Diego Valeri takes out Landon Donovan

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Juninho with a through ball.
Attempt saved. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Justin (NBA CHAMPS!)
timelineItems.text: I want a Juninho goal from distance tonight. Been a looooooooong time since we have seen one. #LAGalaxy #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers).
Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: A yellow card is issued to Diego Valeri on a late tackle from behind on Landon Donovan. Bad Diego. Bad! #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: @nachothekopite Why wait a year to see a game? Come see one of the LA Galaxy's #MLS games this season. #SupportLocal, my treat.

timelineItems.name: Justin (NBA CHAMPS!)
timelineItems.text: Thinking Keane should have maybe passed to Zardes. Had more coverage on him but better chance on goal. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 11’ - DENIED! LA with ball over the top for Keane who’s in 1v1 on Ricketts but he’s off his line to cut down angle for great save! #RCTID

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: SHOT KEANO! The magician beats his man but Ricketts makes himself big and makes the save. This is getting good: http://t.co/lVwZDps8A3

timelineItems.comment: Danny O'Rourke (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Mike Fabert
timelineItems.text: Robbie Rogers as a LB has been pretty solid. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the left side of the box.
timelineItems.title: POST: Marcelo Sarvas curls one off the post after scramble

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy may have a 0 on the scoreboard, but their leading the nutmeg game 3-0 right now. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Justin (NBA CHAMPS!)
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy getting a lot of open space centrally and down the left hand side. Attack! #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 14’ - Nagbe plays out wide to Valeri. Valeri tries to chip ball to Adi in box but ball sails just a bit long. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the left side of the box.
Will Johnson (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: OFF THE WOODWORK! http://t.co/KaCRKufUyA #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 15’ - POST! LA’s Sarvas with a curling shot that pings the woodwork and away. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy).
Michael Harrington (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Marcelo Sarvas just basically broke the goal post. I was directly behind that shot, and wow did it curve. Ricketts just stared. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Portland Timbers. Will Johnson tries a through ball, but Fanendo Adi is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: J.J. Sanchez
timelineItems.text: Landon Donovan is looking nice so far. So are Robbie Keane and Marcelo Sarvas. Need to convert though! #LAGalaxy #LAvsPOR

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: That shot started probably 3 yards outside the post and came all the way back. I gasped. I’m not supposed to gasp. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Danny O'Rourke.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy look very confident in Defense. I’m not sure I know who this team is. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Carlos Dimas
timelineItems.text: Good to see @robbierogers find his place at LB. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, LA Galaxy 2, Portland Timbers 2.

timelineItems.name: Mike Fabert
timelineItems.text: Let's be honest, Robbie Rogers has been VERY good at LB, only a matter of time. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: James
timelineItems.text: 2 MLS Matches tonight and both ending in 2-2 draws #HOUvNY #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Carlos O.
timelineItems.text: Shared spoils, fun last 30 mins. #LAGalaxy 2- #Timbers 2

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: @robbierogers absolutely blasted that last shot, just over the cross bar. Would have been a heck of a finish. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: TaylorAustin
timelineItems.text: Always love to watch @LAGalaxy especially in clenching match like this one. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Somos Timbers
timelineItems.text: TERMINA el partido. #LAvPOR termina en empate, 2-2. #RCTID

timelineItems.desc: The LA Galaxy and Portland Timbers meet for a second time this season in a key Western Conference matchup when the clubs provide the Independence Day festivities at StubHub Center before an NBC Sports Network audience.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: LA Galaxy vs Portland Timbers | July 4, 2014

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Danny O'Rourke.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Robbie Rogers, seems to have some confidence going forward. Just shielded the ball through the middle third and found Zardes. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 23’ - LA’s Ishizaki with a corner from the near side. Ball sails through the area untouched and goes out for POR goal kick. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).
Diego Chara (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: At this point I'm willing to guess the number of quality touches by Adi and Fernandez to be less than five. #lavpor #rctid

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by Robbie Rogers.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy have been hogging possession and racking up the miles going forward. Still waiting for some genius. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Michael Harrington.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 27' Corner for the #LAGalaxy who have been locked in a defensive battle with the Timbers so far

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Here is tonight’s super patriotic starting XI. http://t.co/KaCRKufUyA #LAvPOR http://t.co/WIfEbuGccG

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Here is tonight’s super patriotic starting XI. http://t.co/KaCRKufUyA #LAvPOR http://t.co/WIfEbuGccG

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Bruce Arena already getting into the action. Coming off the bench to get his player the ball on a throw-in. #lAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: I hope the game will be more entertaining than that anthem by @PaulStanleyLive #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Portland Timbers. Will Johnson tries a through ball, but Diego Valeri is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 29' Impressed with the Timbers so far. They've soaked up the pressure generated by LA's extended possession. Still nothing on either side

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: The #lagalaxy have reverted to playing like an #ENG club before EPL teams signed South Americans. All hopeful crosses, all the time

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: Given #MLS salaries, he just might be tomorrow RT @cmpn Caleb Porter looks like he should be folding shirts at Old Navy. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 30’ - Timbers with nice build up in attack but Valeri whistled offside but just a step. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Niki
timelineItems.text: Is the footing terrible? I feel like there's more stumbling than usual on both sides. #LAvPOR #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 31’ - Villafaña with good hustle on the wing but a bit too much on the ensuing cross as it flies across the field. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Great run by Chara. Just by getting in there he earn the Timbers an extra possession which they almost turned in to a decent chance #lavpor

timelineItems.name: Doug Brown
timelineItems.text: Haha forgot that #POR would make the flag. #LAvPOR is what I should have used. My bad on that one Internet. My bad.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Fanendo Adi (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Michael Harrington with a cross.

timelineItems.name: JD Redwine
timelineItems.text: If you are a real US Soccer fan you are watching this #LAvPOR match right now because you know how important the MLS is to our success.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 35' The possession is there for the @LAGalaxy. The passing is there (mostly), but the last bit of class in the final third lacking. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Inches from making it 1-0. #LAvPOR http://t.co/rXXBlKfxLS

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: @LAGalaxyII played earlier RT @strawbrykiwi Is the footing terrible? I feel like there's more stumbling than usual on both sides. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: #Timbers completed 75% of their passes on #LA's part but only 65% in the attacking third. So there's where the attack is stalling #lavpor

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 35’ - Nagbe to Valeri on wing. He leaves for Harrington on overlap. Cross in is a bit behind Adi who gets foot on it but shot wide. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: cmsinser
timelineItems.text: O'Rourke and Mckenzie = Most vulnerable CB pairing in recent #MLS history, right? #MLSonNBC #LAvPOR #Timbers #Galaxy

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Adi gets a touch on the ball and there you have it--#portland 2nd shot. There's a reason why he's being shadowed. #lavpor #rctid

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Ten minutes to go in the first half. It's wide open. Very entertaining match! #lavpor #rctid

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Marcelo Sarvas was inches from opening the scoring with this thunderous shot. Watch: http://t.co/BZMnKzi28R #LAvPOR http://t.co/6n7ptOvd8s

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Marcelo Sarvas was inches from opening the scoring with this thunderous shot. Watch: http://t.co/BZMnKzi28R #LAvPOR http://t.co/6n7ptOvd8s

timelineItems.desc: Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Dan Gargan slides in late and gets booked

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Is there anything more American than Paul Stanley singing the National Anthem at a soccer game? #LAvPOR http://t.co/3x82bnQTO8

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Is there anything more American than Paul Stanley singing the National Anthem at a soccer game? #LAvPOR http://t.co/3x82bnQTO8

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Will Johnson (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: I'd call the #lagalaxy's current formation a 4-4-1-1, because Robbie Keane has apparently decided he's a CAM now

timelineItems.comment: Rauwshan McKenzie (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy).
Foul by A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy).
Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Lets Go Galaxy
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy dominating in ever facet but haven't scored. I really hope this changes eventually. #LAvPOR #MLS

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 40’ - Meanwhile, LA’s Gargan picks up a yellow after fouling McKenzie.

timelineItems.name: David Ulloa
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy doing everything offensively but put the ball in the goal #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Diego Valeri danced into the @LAGalaxy box and put in a great cross. It found no one but it was dangerous. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Gastón Fernández.

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: Thats a terrible nickname RT @LAGalaxy Daniel “Gargs” Gargan is the first #LAGalaxy player in the book #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 42’ - Valeri bangs a strong FK on frame but Penedo picks it out of the air. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Justin (NBA CHAMPS!)
timelineItems.text: Portland getting a hold of this game now. Taking more shots and looking more dangerous. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: Bruce Arena status update: Hands behind back, shaking his head. Like a regional manager unimpressed with the sales floor. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 45’ - Timbers with a great counter. Adi on near post run, Johnson on back. Valeri plays to Johnson but LA defense breaks it up. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Diego Chara.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy look the more dangerous but we’re scoreless at the break: http://t.co/KaCRKufUyA #LAvPOR http://t.co/ulYq7mf4jz

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy look the more dangerous but we’re scoreless at the break: http://t.co/KaCRKufUyA #LAvPOR http://t.co/ulYq7mf4jz

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, LA Galaxy 0, Portland Timbers 0.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: HT - 0-0. Spurts from Portland late, but the game has been mostly controlled by the @LAGalaxy. Only one good chance for LA so far. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: HT @LAGalaxy 0-0 @TimbersFC Good chances from LA, but not enough in the final third. Sarvas hits the post, Zardes wasted chances. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Benny Berrafato
timelineItems.text: Joining the game late, of course, but an exciting first half in [insert home city here] #LAGalaxy #PTFC

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Timbers with 52.9% possession in the first half against the Galaxy. @MLS Matchcenter: http://t.co/E73SsGUd6B #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @kylemartino: "Diego Valeri seems to be getting in the game more and more, how do you neutralize that?" Bruce: "Play better." #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Ok half for the Galaxy from what we saw. Need to be a bit better in possession, but defense looks engaged and sharp. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Simple. MT @MLS: "Diego Valeri seems to be getting in the game more and more, how do you neutralize that?" Bruce: "Play better." #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Cass
timelineItems.text: I thought Harrington had an underrated half: several thoughtful runs that made Rogers hesitate, allowing him space to engage Valeri. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: John Adair
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones to #LAGalaxy?

timelineItems.name: Tiarra
timelineItems.text: Jermaine at #LAvPOR yessss! He wants to play in MLS sooooo hard lol

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins LA Galaxy 0, Portland Timbers 0.
Fanendo Adi (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Juninho (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: We’re back! No changes for either team. The @LAGalaxy are going from Left to Right across your twitter TL. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: And we are off to the races in the second half. LET'S GO #LAGALAXY!!!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Robbie Keane.
Attempt saved. Fanendo Adi (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Donovan Ricketts.
Foul by Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy).
Rauwshan McKenzie (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 49’ - Ricketts clears ball upfield all the way for Adi. He stays with it and snaps a shot on frame but saved. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: McKenzie was apparently fouled by Landon Donovan. Donovan complains to referee Marrufo and McKenzie bumps Donovan. Really? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 5’ - LA with a long FK into the box but McKenzie heads away for Timbers counter. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Josh Gabriel
timelineItems.text: Landon Donovan has been a bit cranky the past few weeks. Just showed a defender chasing a ball. #USA #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: LAGConfidential
timelineItems.text: Homies and homettes, imagine if the #lagalaxy had Jermaine Jones? Crosses with intended targets, it could be a revolution.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Timbers really keeping their form, Zardes is the target man with Keane drifting in from the right wing. Defense has held. #lavpor #rctid

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is too high.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Robbie Keane goes full power just over the bar

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Okay, now Zardes has drifted out left, Donovan now comes in from the right wing with Keane in the middle. So many looks. #lavpor #rctid

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Keane with a volley, would have been something special, but over the bar. #LAGalaxy #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy).
Fanendo Adi (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Diego Chara (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Portland is building possession and danger. I feel a defensive breakdown coming. #LAGalaxy with nothing going forward. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 59’ - Harrington with a nice cross from the right side for Fernández in the box. His header knocked away. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portland Timbers. Conceded by A.J. DeLaGarza.

timelineItems.name: Matthew Hoffman
timelineItems.text: Keano tried to spring Zardes. #Timbers defender smothered him. Ricketts came out and cleared it #lavpor #rctid

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 5' Gaston Fernandez is down on the ground, but gets back up after a long sequence of #LAGalaxy possession. Corner for Portland. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Rauwshan McKenzie (Portland Timbers) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Diego Valeri with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 6’ - LA recover and come back the other way. Ricketts way off his line to knock ball down field. #RCTID

timelineItems.comment: Darlington Nagbe (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).
Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gastón Fernández (Portland Timbers).
Attempt saved. Will Johnson (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 61’ - Johnson hammers a free kick that gives Penedo fits. He juggles and knocks away nervously. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Dan Gargan - Man, Myth, Legend? You decide. But he’s been the MOTM on either side of the ball tonight. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 1, Portland Timbers 0. Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Marcelo Sarvas curls the opener beyond Ricketts

timelineItems.name: Jennifer Gonzales
timelineItems.text: Let's go @LAGalaxy!! Get it!! #LAvPOR #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Great block by Gargan as he shuts the door on a dangerous chance AND he earned the free kick. I guess he reads my tweets. #LAGalaxy #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Somos Timbers
timelineItems.text: 63' #LAvPOR sigue empatado, 0-0, con varias oportunidades excelentes para ambos equipos. #RCTID #VamosTimbers

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: 65’ - GOAL. LA’s Sarvas fires from edge of the area and the Galaxy lead 1-0. #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Marcelo Sarvas just scored. And now I have to admit that @LAGalaxyInsider told me in the early minutes he’d score. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: This time @MarceloSarvas gets it right. He opens up & picks out the far corner. 1-0 @LAGalaxy. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 1, Portland Timbers 1. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Diego Valeri blasts home the equalizer

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Fanendo Adi (Portland Timbers) header from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jorge Villafaña with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Benny Berrafato
timelineItems.text: But the Timbers have to defend that better. You can't let Sarvas get an easy chance like that. #LAGalaxy #PTFC

timelineItems.name: BIG ED
timelineItems.text: #MLS Diego Valeri Goal #LAGalaxy 1 #RCTID 1

timelineItems.name: Travis Johnson
timelineItems.text: How typical. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @TimbersFC march back down the field and find the equalizer. Diego Valeri smashes it home. 1-1 on @NBCSN. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: And just 2 minutes later, Valeri equalises! Fantastic strike, keeper didn't have a chance. The Timbers come from behind again! #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Peter Strawn
timelineItems.text: Okay, @MLS, you're starting to win me over. This #LAvPOR match has been fun and exciting to watch. I hope there are more goals in this one.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  LA Galaxy 1, Portland Timbers 2. Jorge Villafana (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Jorge Villafana buries a loose ball in the box

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: @nachothekopite That's how all #LAGalaxy games start. #WWE.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki is down on the field. he Pops back up flexing his right knee. He seems okay. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Another loose ball in the box and Portland wins this battle too. The Timbers' Jorge Villafana knocks it in. #LAGalaxy trail 2-1

timelineItems.name: ryanagcawheelie
timelineItems.text: The clearances have been horrible in the past few minutes. Practically gifting scoring opportunities to the Timber #LAGalaxy #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Sean Donahue
timelineItems.text: Crazy last six minutes of action in #LAGalaxy v. #RCTID. @NBCSN #MLS

timelineItems.name: Matthew Zimmerman
timelineItems.text: It's really strange watching an #LAGalaxy team that, once it trails, there's little reason to think it will come back and win. Weird season.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Jorge Villafaña.

timelineItems.name: Dan Hilton
timelineItems.text: 3 goals in 5 mins during #LAvPOR w/ Porter's men coming back, now up 2-1. Who says there are no goals in the #MLS

timelineItems.name: ryanagcawheelie
timelineItems.text: Landon Donovan goes down in the box, and the referee ignores him the same way Jurgen Klinsmann did.. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.desc: Diego Chara (Portland Timbers) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Diego Chara drops Landon Donovan on the break

timelineItems.comment: Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Will Johnson (Portland Timbers).
Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Diego Chara (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: BOG
timelineItems.text: Referee says your still not going to Brazil, Landon. #RCTID #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Uncle D!
timelineItems.text: 3 goals in 5 minutes. Jorge Villafaña makes ot 2-1 #LAvPOR #RCTID

timelineItems.name: Off to Neverland
timelineItems.text: Is it just me or is Donovan kinda relying waaaaay too much on being fouled? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Glad to see Rodney Wallace is alive. Torn ACLs are rough. #LAvPOR #LWOS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Donovan Ricketts swats away a Juninho free kick

timelineItems.name: Raquel Braun
timelineItems.text: Some awful awful awful officiating in the @LAGalaxy game!! Haven't seen something this bad in a while! @MLS #lagalaxy #portlandtimbers

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Donovan Ricketts.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: So close Juni! The li’l Brazilian almost grabs an equalizer. #LAvPOR is getting cray cray: http://t.co/KaCRKufUyA

timelineItems.name: Amy ⚓
timelineItems.text: @landondonovan my blood is boiling watching this #LAvPOR game. Even more so being a #Sounders fan. Give 'em hell.

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: @Juninho19LA's free kick was nasty, as was Rickett's save. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Kristian Russell
timelineItems.text: Actually, you CAN blame the ref for missing that one, because that's HIS JOB to call stuff like that. #duh #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 8’ the @LAGalaxy have found no rhythm. Luckily, neither have the timbers. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Sting
timelineItems.text: The ref not awarding penalty kicks for Landon Donovan because of his comments about the #USMNT. Lol. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The @LAGalaxy are getting angry. Expect another card and a goal or two in this one. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Rob Friend is coming onto the field for AJ DeLaGaraza. 3 up top. 3 in the back. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Whelp, that was fun while it lasted. Watch Marcelo’s sweet opening goal: http://t.co/yxhmR3Jb6D #LAvPOR http://t.co/1HMFHfnfF3

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Whelp, that was fun while it lasted. Watch Marcelo’s sweet opening goal: http://t.co/yxhmR3Jb6D #LAvPOR http://t.co/1HMFHfnfF3

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Omar Gonzalez is walking around at field level, receiving some standing ovations and, most importantly, a hug from @kylemartino. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Pregame for #LAvPOR is on @NBCSN right now. Tune-in! #RCTID

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: .@Omar4Gonzalez is back from the #WorldCup and he has a message for #LAGalaxy fans. Watch: http://t.co/lVwZDps8A3 http://t.co/UzGDoNjbo5

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: .@Omar4Gonzalez is back from the #WorldCup and he has a message for #LAGalaxy fans. Watch: http://t.co/lVwZDps8A3 http://t.co/UzGDoNjbo5

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Tender moment between Bruce Arena and former #LAGalaxy ‘keeper Donovan Ricketts. #LAvPOR http://t.co/ecD7L68tLC

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Tender moment between Bruce Arena and former #LAGalaxy ‘keeper Donovan Ricketts. #LAvPOR http://t.co/ecD7L68tLC

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: Rob Friend coming into the game for A.J. DeLaGarza . I'm predicting that the #LAGalaxy get a penalty before this one is over.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: It should be pointed out that the HILL is open for tonight’s game. I’m expecting 27,000. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy SRH
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy RT " The man of the hour, @Omar4Gonzalez speaks to @StrongMLS on @NBCSN ahead of #LAvPOR.... " #SportsRoadhouse

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: .@Omar4Gonzalez found some familiar faces at @StubHubCenter. We’re minutes from kickoff on @NBCSN. http://t.co/b9oEe0H6bt

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: .@Omar4Gonzalez found some familiar faces at @StubHubCenter. We’re minutes from kickoff on @NBCSN. http://t.co/b9oEe0H6bt

timelineItems.name: Larry Tiscornia
timelineItems.text: Yep, Paul Stanley of KISS will be singing Nat'l Anthem on #NBCSN after this break at the Stub Hub Center #MLS #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: If I wanted to hear Paul Stanley sing the National Anthem... NM, I've NEVER wanted to hear Paul Stanley sing the National Anthem. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Jared DuBois
timelineItems.text: It means he owns property... “@GalaxyPodcast: Jermaine Jones is at tonight’s @LAGalaxy game. Read into that what you will. #LAGalaxy”

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: @LAGalaxy vs Portland Timbers, live at http://t.co/E1aXpxh8GW Happy 4th of July! #MLS #soccer

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: This lineup, this exact lineup, is almost exciting as an @LAGalaxy fan. It’s time to get that offense working. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Portland Timbers
timelineItems.text: Timbers coming out for national anthem. Will be wearing their #greenandgold third kit tonight. #RCTID #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Warm ups are done. It’s about time you flip over to @NBCSN. https://t.co/0hJzNE9ndd #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: @MLSist @cboehm Yep...here he is serving me wings. http://t.co/lrFwzFYBsT

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: @MLSist @cboehm Yep...here he is serving me wings. http://t.co/lrFwzFYBsT

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Can’t make it to a TV? You can listen to a live audio stream of tonight’s match at the Hub: http://t.co/N3xD8R2XHz #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Joseph
timelineItems.text: Paul Stanley should yell the national anthem. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Matt Swift
timelineItems.text: Gargan looks like a rugby player but he's pretty dangerous going forward #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: scurvytooth
timelineItems.text: Paul Stanley can't sing. #LAGalaxy #LAvsPOR

timelineItems.name: Mike Pacific
timelineItems.text: What a great national anthem rendition by that lounge singer. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: USA rings throughout the stadium and people are clearing the field. We’ve got ourselves a game. Let’s go! #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Happy 4th of July from everyone at #CoG. Let's get this game going. #lagalaxy @ StubHub Center http://t.co/16yT4euBSd

timelineItems.name: Nystrom, Andrew
timelineItems.text: The World Cup doesn't have Paul Stanley of KISS singing the national anthem. http://t.co/1nrZrkyr2t Happy #4thofJuly #USA #LAvPOR #rctid

timelineItems.name: Nystrom, Andrew
timelineItems.text: The World Cup doesn't have Paul Stanley of KISS singing the national anthem. http://t.co/1nrZrkyr2t Happy #4thofJuly #USA #LAvPOR #rctid

timelineItems.name: Lee Margulies
timelineItems.text: National anthem performed at #LAGalaxy game by Paul Stanley of KISS. Without makeup. Got all the words right too.

timelineItems.desc: Rauwshan McKenzie scores an own goal to tie the match 2-2.
timelineItems.title: OWN GOAL: Rauwshan McKenzie knocks it into his own net

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 84' OVER THE BAR. Husidic with an attempt that sails over the bar. #LAGalaxy starting to get anxious.

timelineItems.name: Mike Fabert
timelineItems.text: Husidic HAS to finish that. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy Dispatch
timelineItems.text: Good idea on the throw in, leads to a Husidic volley into the 10th row. COME ON BOYS! I BELIEVE! #LAGalaxy #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: And that’s a good ole’ fashioned OWN GOAL. The Galaxy get the goal they need. We’re tied. 2-2 in the 86th minute. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Robbie Rogers tries a through ball, but Robbie Keane is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Erik Abarca
timelineItems.text: What a chip from Donovan. #lagalaxy #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Ryan Pizzuto
timelineItems.text: Portland loves draws so much they score on themselves to ensure it. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Chris Bils
timelineItems.text: My apologies @ehill2014. #LAvPOR is actually much more entertaining than #HON vs. #ECU.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Diego Valeri (Portland Timbers) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kalif Alhassan with a through ball.
Foul by Rodney Wallace (Portland Timbers).
Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Jaime Penedo has more blocks tonight than a LEGO factory: http://t.co/KaCRKufUyA #LAvPOR (h/t @thefiver)

timelineItems.name: Callan McClurg
timelineItems.text: Haha, Lol RT @LAGalaxy: Jaime Penedo has more blocks tonight than a LEGO factory: http://t.co/UoIB7Mk9Y8 #LAvPOR (h/t @thefiver)

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: The ref indicates a minimum of four minutes of stoppage time. Chandler Hoffman comes on for Juni: http://t.co/KaCRKufUyA #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Off to Neverland
timelineItems.text: Damn we're getting more than our moneys worth for Gargan. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Ron Waxman
timelineItems.text: Good hustle by @HeyDanGargan working his ass off in 89th minute running back hard to save a goal. #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Rob Friend (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jorge Villafaña (Portland Timbers).

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: It’s all happening… #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Chandler Hoffman (LA Galaxy) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Michael Harrington.
Foul by Chandler Hoffman (LA Galaxy).
Rauwshan McKenzie (Portland Timbers) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Marcelo Sarvas curls in @LAGalaxy's first of the match: http://t.co/QA7jjobiTC #LAvPOR

timelineItems.name: Davin Lassiter
timelineItems.text: Robbie Rogers did something! #LAvPOR

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Landon Donovan.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Donovan Ricketts.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Robbie Rogers with a rocket that forces a corner kick. This should be it for the game. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, LA Galaxy 2, Portland Timbers 2.
